about_the_game:
Go North is the first immersive maze adventure ever. With the help of numerous magical and technological items, navigate beautifully unique mazes and explore numerous expansive worlds in a story-driven adventure like no other.

Story

It is said that the Maze God resides at the northernmost part of the world and that he grants one wish to any adventurer brave and cunning enough to reach him. But to truly Go North, you’d have to navigate countless difficult mazes and labyrinths purposefully crafted by the Maze Makers to get you lost.

Dara begins her journey with singular purpose, to meet the Maze God and have her undying wish granted. But something sinister seems to be corrupting the mazes. Something… or someone.

Features

  • Navigate beautiful mazes in 3rd person: Walk around atmospheric and gorgeous mazes while discovering different items, characters, puzzles and stories.

  • Find, keep and use unique but helpful items: There are numerous different items scattered around each maze ranging from simple items like a stop sign to more functional items like a robot mouse that scurries towards the exit.

  • Solve puzzles and avoid obstacles: Use your wits to solve the different puzzles and obstacles within each maze. decipher different riddles and clues to uncover secret passages, items and easter eggs

  • Multiplayer: Compete online against your friends and players across the globe, cross-platform

  • Arcade: Explore an infinite amount of cleverly generated mazes of varying forms and worlds

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.15, or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 2 GB of RAM minimum
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Go North

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
